abstract: Residents from Rep John Boehner's district in southwestern Ohio reflect upon his resignation from Congress; local Republicans are divided over his tenure, with many criticizing him for capitulating to Democrats, even as they doubt Washington's partisan political culture will permit his successor to succeed.
lead_paragraph: The resignation of John A. Boehner was welcomed by some Ohioans who felt he had strayed from conservative ideals, but others were sad to see him go.

headline.main: Reactions on Boehner’s Home Turf Reflect Divisions in G.O.P.
headline.print_headline: Reaction in Boehner’s District Reflects the Split in His Party

snippet: The resignation of John A. Boehner was welcomed by some Ohioans who felt he had strayed from conservative ideals, but others were sad to see him go.
